## Workspace.on() method

Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
on(name: 'editor-menu', callback: (menu: Menu, editor: Editor, info: MarkdownView | MarkdownFileInfo) => any, ctx?: any): EventRef;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>name</code> | <code>'editor-menu'</code> |  |
|  <code>callback</code> | <code>(menu: </code>[`Menu`]()<code>, editor: </code>[`Editor`]()<code>, info: </code>[`MarkdownView`]()<code> &#124; </code>[`MarkdownFileInfo`]()<code>) =&gt; any</code> |  |
|  <code>ctx</code> | <code>any</code> | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[`EventRef`]()
